alert.note: Alert for Wabasha (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 8:13PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Wabasha, Buffalo and northwestern Trempealeau Counties through 845 PM CST... At 813 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Wabasha, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Wabasha around 820 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this storm include Pioneer Campground, Cream, Mondovi Airfield, Highway 88 And County O, West Albany, County Roads F And K K, County Roads 33 And 4, Rattlesnake Ridge, Theilman and Maple Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
